Title: Embellished Top Halter Evening Dress

----

Sku: 8713A

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice: 

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 4, 12, 16, 10, 14, 8, 6

----

Colors: royal

----

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: 8713A-royal-embellished-top-halter-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: A sparkling halter top that is pieced together with triangles covered in jewels. The architecture of the top is intricate. Sheer panels throughout the top add a flirtatious look to this gown. The jersey knit skirt falls to the floor where it sweeps into a court train and the sides of the skirt are both accented with sheer vertical strips.
